title: Whole30 Chicken Meatballs and Cauliflower Rice with Coconut-Herb Sauce
directions: MAKE THE MEATBALLS: Preheat the oven to 375°F. Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil and spray it with nonstick spray.
In a medium skillet pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and sauté until tender, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and sauté until fragrant, about 1 minute.

Transfer the onion and garlic to a medium bowl and cool slightly. Stir in the chicken, parsley and mustard; season with salt and pepper. Form the mixture into 2 tablespoon-size balls and transfer to the baking sheet.
Bake the meatballs until firm and fully cooked, 17 to 20 minutes.
MAKE THE SAUCE: In the bowl of a food processor, combine the coconut milk, parsley, scallions, garlic, lemon zest and lemon juice and process until smooth; season with salt and pepper.
Top the meatballs with the red pepper flakes and the remaining parsley. Serve over the cauliflower rice with the sauce.
ingredients: ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
